metadata.name: Service Registry Key Deleted Via Reg.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "reg.exe" commands with the "delete" flag on services registry key. Often used by attacker to remove AV software services

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('reg.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('reg.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' delete ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\system\\\\currentcontrolset\\\\services\\\\')))

output.summary: Detects execution of "reg.exe" commands with the "delete" flag on services registry key. Often used by attacker to remove AV software services
